# [Current State of MEDA](https://docs.neurodata.io/meda/stable/)

## Hierarchical GMM Tests

We have conducted some tests on our hierarchical GMM (via
[mclust](http://www.stat.washington.edu/mclust/)) algorithm.  
The first was a test where the data are sampled from a mixture of 4
Gaussians.  
The second was a test where the data are sampled from $Unif[0,1]$.  
Notebooks can be found at the links below.

#### [HGMM test: 4-GMM](./tests/hgmm.html)

#### [HGMM test: Unif(0,1)](./tests/hgmm.html)

### [Working version of Notes](http://neurodata-dev.github.io/synaptome-stats/Draft/Notes/Notes201706.html)
